changeSet.author: dchettupuzha
changeSet.comment: Add new insurance carriers to insuranceproviderdetail table
changeSet.sql: insert into `prodlims`.`insuranceproviderdetail`(`insuranceprovider_name`, `insuranceprovider_states`, `validfromdate`) values("Superior CHIP|SuperiorCHIP|Superior Health Plan|Superior HealthPlan|Superior Children's Health Insurance Plan|Superior Medicaid|Superior Health Medicaid", null, '2016-07-01');
changeSet.rollback: delete from `prodlims`.`insuranceproviderdetail` where `id` > 22 and `insuranceprovider_name` like '%Superior Health Plan%';
